title: Model Pricing Index (OpenRouter, per-million tokens)
description: USD pricing per 1,000,000 tokens for models returned by the OpenRouter API (https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/models).

items.description: Pricing record for a single model

provider.description: Top-level provider extracted from model id (e.g., 'openai', 'google').

model.description: Exact model identifier as returned by OpenRouter (e.g., 'openai/gpt-4o-mini' or 'google/gemini-2.5-pro').

input_price_per_million_usd.description: Price in USD per 1,000,000 input (prompt) tokens. Null if unavailable.

output_price_per_million_usd.description: Price in USD per 1,000,000 output (completion) tokens. Null if unavailable.

last_updated.description: UTC date (YYYY-MM-DD) when the pricing record was generated.

source.description: Source of pricing data. Fixed to 'openrouter'.

source_url.description: URL used to retrieve the data (https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/models).

metadata.description: Optional extra information to aid costing and diagnostics.

context_length.description: Approximate maximum context length, if provided by OpenRouter.

raw_pricing.description: Original pricing sub-object from OpenRouter response for reference.
